text: BBC News Arabic for Sudan also called BBC Arabic Emergency Radio Service for Sudan has been begun British Broadcasting Corporation to serve the people of Sudan in the Arabic language. It will be twice a day for a short time starting in the afternoon on 2 May 2023 while the fighting in Sudan continues. It hopes to help the public in Sudan while the fighting continues. The radio will be on 21,510 kHz at 09:00 (07:00 UTC) and on 15,310kHz at 17:00 (15:00 UTC). == References == == Other websites == Category:BBC radio
title: BBC News Arabic for Sudan
